modelIdentification.name: CBRN
modelIdentification.description: The CBRN FOM module specifies objects and interactions necessary to enable CBRN modelling.
modelIdentification.useHistory: v1.0.0 - Initial; object, interaction classes and datatypes.
v1.0.2 - Added missing QuantityUInt32 simple data type, fixed IPEEnum values.

v1.1.0 - Added new attributes to ATP45HazardArea, CBRN_Sensor and CBRN_Detector. Added parent interaction type to COLPROUpdate and DecontaminationStationUpdate. Re-used existing RPR and NETN simple data types. Renamed several data types and attribute names.
v1.1.2 - Added ValidityTime attribute to ATP45HazardArea.
v1.1.6 - Standardised on Agent for agent name. Used correct naming convention for CBRN_FacilityUpdate.
v1.1.7 - Changed update conditions for certain attributes. Added UniqueID attributes to hazard contours.
v1.1.8 - Added TIC agents to AgentTypeEnum16.

poc.pocName: Hazard Assessment Simulation and Prediction (HASP) Group

objectClass.name: ATP45HazardArea
objectClass.semantics: Represents the footprint generated by a CBRN warning and reporting simulation. This follows the NATO ATP-45 doctrine to generate a hazard area.

attribute.name: Time
attribute.semantics: Simulation time at which this hazard area was generated.

attribute.name: ValidityTime
attribute.semantics: Duration (in seconds) from the Time attribute that this hazard area prediction is valid.

attribute.name: Locations
attribute.semantics: Array of locations that define the hazard area

attribute.name: ATP45HazardAreaType
attribute.semantics: This hazard area's type

attribute.name: AgentClass
attribute.semantics: The agent class

attribute.name: UniqueID
attribute.semantics: Unique representation of the area’s ID.

objectClass.name: COLPRO
objectClass.semantics: Represents a feature that provides Collective Protection (COLPRO) against a CBRN threat.

attribute.name: NumberEntities
attribute.semantics: The number of entities that this COLPRO can handle.

attribute.name: Protection
attribute.semantics: The effectiveness that this COLPRO offers for each agent.

objectClass.name: DecontaminationStation
objectClass.semantics: Represents a feature that provides treatment for CBRN exposure.

attribute.name: NumberEntities
attribute.semantics: The number of entities that this decontamination station can handle.

attribute.name: DecontaminationPeriod
attribute.semantics: Duration in seconds it takes to decontaminate an entity.

attribute.name: Treatments
attribute.semantics: The types of treatment that this decontamination station currently offers.

objectClass.name: CBRN_Human
objectClass.semantics: Extension of NETN_Human to provide CBRN modelling.

attribute.name: Exposures
attribute.semantics: Array of agents to which this entity has been exposed to. Defaults to an empty array.

attribute.name: Treatments
attribute.semantics: The types of treatment that this entity has used. Defaults to an empty array.

attribute.name: TriageLevel
attribute.semantics: Triage level of this entity. Defaults to Uninjured.

attribute.name: IPEType
attribute.semantics: Type of IPE that the entity has donned. Defaults to None.

objectClass.name: CBRN_Aircraft
objectClass.semantics: Extension of NETN_Aircraft to provide CBRN modelling.

attribute.name: Contamination
attribute.semantics: CBRN hazardous agent inside vehicle due to embedded units.

objectClass.name: CBRN_AmphibiousVehicle
objectClass.semantics: Extension of NETN_AmphibiousVehicle to provide CBRN modelling.

attribute.name: Contamination
attribute.semantics: CBRN hazardous agent inside vehicle due to embedded units.

objectClass.name: CBRN_GroundVehicle
objectClass.semantics: Extension of NETN_GroundVehicle to provide CBRN modelling.

attribute.name: Contamination
attribute.semantics: CBRN hazardous agent inside vehicle due to embedded units.

objectClass.name: CBRN_MultiDomainPlatform
objectClass.semantics: Extension of NETN_MultiDomainPlatform to provide CBRN modelling.

attribute.name: Contamination
attribute.semantics: CBRN hazardous agent inside vehicle due to embedded units.

objectClass.name: CBRN_Spacecraft
objectClass.semantics: Extension of NETN_Spacecraft to provide CBRN modelling.

attribute.name: Contamination
attribute.semantics: CBRN hazardous agent inside vehicle due to embedded units.

objectClass.name: CBRN_SubmersibleVehicle
objectClass.semantics: Extension of NETN_SubmersibleVehicle to provide CBRN modelling.

attribute.name: Contamination
attribute.semantics: CBRN hazardous agent inside vehicle due to embedded units.

objectClass.name: CBRN_SurfaceVessel
objectClass.semantics: Extension of NETN_SurfaceVessel to provide CBRN modelling.

attribute.name: Contamination
attribute.semantics: CBRN hazardous agent inside vehicle due to embedded units.

objectClass.name: CBRN_Detector
objectClass.semantics: Represents a CBRN detector. This object is used to pass information to a CBRN federate, which will model the detector internally and publish a CBRN_DetectorAlarm.

attribute.name: UniqueID
attribute.semantics: Unique representation of the detector’s ID.

attribute.name: ProcessingTime
attribute.semantics: Duration (in seconds) between the detector being exposed to a concentration of agent above its threshold and the detector raising an alarm.

attribute.name: AveragingTime
attribute.semantics: Duration (in seconds) over which the detector will collect samples.

attribute.name: DetectableAgents
attribute.semantics: Array of detectable agents and their thresholds.

attribute.name: Alarm
attribute.semantics: Data representing the alarm of this detector. Defaults to no alarm if the attribute is not set.

objectClass.name: CBRN_Sensor
objectClass.semantics: Represents a CBRN sensor. This object is used to pass information to a CBRN federate, which will return sensor readings by publishing CBRN_SensorUpdate interactions.

attribute.name: UniqueID
attribute.semantics: Unique representation of the sensor’s ID.

attribute.name: UpdateFrequency
attribute.semantics: Duration (in seconds) that this sensor would like between updated readings.

attribute.name: AveragingTime
attribute.semantics: Duration (in seconds) over which the sensor will collect samples.

attribute.name: DetectableAgents
attribute.semantics: Array of agents that this sensor wishes to detect.

attribute.name: SensorReadings
attribute.semantics: Latest sensor readings. Defaults to no readings if this attribute is not set.

objectClass.name: ProbabilityHazardContourGroup
objectClass.semantics: Represents the footprint covered by a CBRN hazard. This object covers the agent-specific effects which would be the output from a casualty model.

attribute.name: Time
attribute.semantics: Simulation time at which this contour group was generated.

attribute.name: Agent
attribute.semantics: Agent reflected in this contour.

attribute.name: ExposureType
attribute.semantics: Type of exposure.

attribute.name: Contours
attribute.semantics: Array of contours. These should be ordered in a sequence of ascending PercentProbabilityLevel.

attribute.name: UniqueID
attribute.semantics: Unique representation of the contour’s ID.

objectClass.name: RawDataHazardContourGroup
objectClass.semantics: Represents the footprint covered by a CBRN hazard. This object covers the raw data which would be the output from a dispersion model.

attribute.name: Time
attribute.semantics: Simulation time at which this contour group was generated.

attribute.name: Agent
attribute.semantics: Agent reflected in this contour.

attribute.name: HazardType
attribute.semantics: Type of hazard.

attribute.name: Contours
attribute.semantics: Array of contours. These should be ordered in a sequence of ascending ExposureLevel.

attribute.name: UniqueID
attribute.semantics: Unique representation of the contour’s ID.

interactionClass.name: CBRN_Casualty
interactionClass.semantics: Represents a CBRN casualty caused by exposure. This is for use with federates that cannot support the TriageLevel attribute in CBRN_Human.

parameter.name: UniqueID
parameter.semantics: Unique representation of the entity’s ID.

parameter.name: TriageLevel
parameter.semantics: Triage level of this entity.

parameter.name: Exposures
parameter.semantics: Array of agents to which this unit has been exposed.

interactionClass.name: CBRN_DetectorAlarm
interactionClass.semantics: Represents the alarm trigger of a previously registered CBRN detector.

parameter.name: DetectorID
parameter.semantics: Unique representation of the detector’s ID.

parameter.name: Alarm
parameter.semantics: Details of the alarm.

interactionClass.name: CBRN_PlatformUpdate
interactionClass.semantics: Represents an update to the contaminating mass inside a vehicle due to embedded entities.

parameter.name: PlatformID
parameter.semantics: The unique ID of the platform.

parameter.name: Contamination
parameter.semantics: New state of CBRN hazardous agent inside vehicle due to embedded units.

interactionClass.name: CBRN_Release
interactionClass.semantics: Communicates information associated with the release of hazardous agent.

parameter.name: UniqueID
parameter.semantics: Unique representation of the release’s ID.

parameter.name: Agent
parameter.semantics: The released agent.

parameter.name: Location
parameter.semantics: Initial location of the release in the geocentric location system.

parameter.name: Mass
parameter.semantics: Total released mass in kg.

parameter.name: Duration
parameter.semantics: Duration in seconds over which the release takes place.

parameter.name: ReleaseSize
parameter.semantics: Includes SourceSize (sigmas), mean and variance of released particulates.

parameter.name: ReleaseDynamics
parameter.semantics: Temperature and buoyancy of released mass.

parameter.name: ReleaseVelocity
parameter.semantics: Velocity of the source term.

interactionClass.name: CBRN_SensorUpdate
interactionClass.semantics: Sends information about the current state of a previously registered CBRN sensor.

parameter.name: Time
parameter.semantics: Time of this sensor update

parameter.name: SensorID
parameter.semantics: Unique representation of the sensor’s ID.

parameter.name: Readings
parameter.semantics: Readings for this sensor

interactionClass.name: CBRN_FacilityUpdate
interactionClass.semantics: Represents an order for the specified entities to enter or leave the CBRN facility.

parameter.name: FacilityID
parameter.semantics: The unique ID of the CBRN facility.

parameter.name: EmbeddedUnitList
parameter.semantics: List of unique IDs of the entities who will enter or exit the CBRN facility.

parameter.name: IsEntry
parameter.semantics: Determines whether the entities are entering (IsEntry = true) or exiting (IsEntry = false) the CBRN facility.

interactionClass.name: COLPROUpdate
interactionClass.semantics: Represents an order for the specified entities to enter or leave the COLPRO.

interactionClass.name: DecontaminationStationUpdate
interactionClass.semantics: Represents an order for the specified entities to enter or leave the decontamination station.

interactionClass.name: IPECommand
interactionClass.semantics: Represents an order for the specified entities to don protective equipment.

parameter.name: UnitList
parameter.semantics: List of unique IDs of the entities who will don IPE.

parameter.name: IPEType
parameter.semantics: Type of IPE that the entities will don.

interactionClass.name: CBRN_TreatmentCommand
interactionClass.semantics: Represents an order for the specified entities to receive the list of treatments.

parameter.name: UnitList
parameter.semantics: List of unique IDs of the entities who will receive the treatment.

parameter.name: Treatments
parameter.semantics: Type of treatment to be applied to the entities.

simpleData.name: DensityRatioFloat32
simpleData.semantics: Ratio of density of two materials in range [0, 1].

simpleData.name: MeanMetersFloat32
simpleData.semantics: Mean of a Gaussian distribution, based on SI unit meter, unit symbol m.

simpleData.name: VarianceMetersSquaredFloat32
simpleData.semantics: Variance of a Gaussian distribution, based on SI unit meter squared, unit symbol m2.

enumeratedData.name: AgentClassEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: Class of Agent for an ATP-45 Hazard Area.

enumeratedData.name: ATP45HazardAreaTypeEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: Type of ATP-45 Hazard Area (simple or detailed).

enumeratedData.name: CBRNDamageEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: Level of damage due to CBRN exposure.

enumeratedData.name: ExposureTypeEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: Type of exposure represented in a contour group.

enumeratedData.name: HazardTypeEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: Type of dispersion output represented in a contour group.

arrayData.name: ArrayOfAgentConcentrationStruct
arrayData.semantics: Array of agents and their concentrations.

arrayData.name: ArrayOfAgentMassStruct
arrayData.semantics: Array of agents and their masses.

arrayData.name: ArrayOfCBRNExposureStruct
arrayData.semantics: Array of agents and their dosages.

arrayData.name: ArrayOfRawDataHazardContourStruct
arrayData.semantics: Array of Raw Data Hazard Contours.

arrayData.name: ArrayOfSigmas6
arrayData.semantics: Size of the initial Gaussian puff sigma values.

fixedRecordData.name: AgentConcentrationStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Concentration value associated with a specific agent.

field.name: MeanConcentration
field.semantics: Concentration in kg m-3.

field.name: Agent
field.semantics: Enumeration representation of the agent.

fixedRecordData.name: AgentMassStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Mass of contaminant inside a vehicle brought in by an embedded unit.

field.name: ContaminatedMass
field.semantics: Mass in kg of contaminant.

field.name: Agent
field.semantics: Enumeration representation of the agent.

field.name: Time
field.semantics: Simulation time of this detector alarm.

field.name: Location
field.semantics: Location of the detector alarm.

field.name: Agent
field.semantics: Agent that the detector believes to have triggered this alarm.

fixedRecordData.name: CBRNExposureStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Dosage exposure value associated with a specific agent.

field.name: Exposure
field.semantics: Dosage value (in kg.s.m-3) which has caused this casualty. Defaults to 0.0.

field.name: Agent
field.semantics: Enumeration representation of the agent.

field.name: Time
field.semantics: Simulation time of this sensor reading.

field.name: Reading
field.semantics: Agent and concentration value in this reading.

fixedRecordData.name: ProbabilityHazardContourStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Represents the footprint covered by a CBRN hazard. This object covers the agent-specific effects which would be the output from a casualty model.

field.name: PercentProbabilityLevel
field.semantics: Percentage of entities within this contour being affected to the define exposure level.

field.name: Locations
field.semantics: Array of locations that define the probability contour.

fixedRecordData.name: ProtectionEffectivenessStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Protection effectiveness associated with a specific agent.

field.name: Effectiveness
field.semantics: Percentage by which this protection reduces effects.

field.name: Agent
field.semantics: Enumeration representation of the agent.

fixedRecordData.name: RawDataHazardContourStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Contour locations bounding a given exposure value.

field.name: ExposureLevel
field.semantics: Quantity of exposure, measured in SI units.

field.name: Locations
field.semantics: Array of locations that define the hazard contour.

fixedRecordData.name: ReleaseDistributionStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Mean and variance of the distribution of the particles or droplets in a release.

field.name: Mean
field.semantics: Mean size of the released material in meters.

field.name: Variance
field.semantics: Variance of the distribution of released particulates/droplets.

fixedRecordData.name: ReleaseDynamicsStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Defines the dynamic properties of a release.

field.name: DensityRatio
field.semantics: Ratio of material density relative to the atmosphere.

field.name: TemperatureDifference
field.semantics: Difference in temperature between the released material and the atmosphere in Celsius.

fixedRecordData.name: ReleaseSizeStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Defines the properties of the initial size of a release.

field.name: SigmaArray
field.semantics: Initial Gaussian sigmas of the released puff.

field.name: ReleaseDistribution
field.semantics: Details regarding the size of the released particles/droplets for non-gaseous materials.

fixedRecordData.name: TreatmentStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Defines the properties for a CBRN treatment.

field.name: UniqueID
field.semantics: The ID of this treatment.

field.name: Effectiveness
field.semantics: Percentage by which this treatment reduces effects.

field.name: Duration
field.semantics: Duration in seconds for which this treatment will remain effective.

field.name: TreatmentWindow
field.semantics: The time window in seconds between exposure and treatment for which this treatment is effective.

field.name: TreatableAgents
field.semantics: Array of agents that can be treated using this treatment.
